page.title: 03EWEFIELD FARM - CHESTERTON
page.content: Ewefield Farm covers 541 acres of land.On it are 223 animals,all of which are black and white Friesian cattle except for one Canadian Holstein.There are six tractors, combined harvesters,ploughs,discs, harrows and other equipment.The crops grown are 280 acres of wheat 65 of grassland.There are seven steel buildings,a pigsty,barns and two houses.Five people work on this farm all of whom live locally,two in tied cottages.Most of the year they work from 7.30a.m. until 7.00p.m. but at harvest time they work until midnight.
